thread.title_full: NRL, AFL live games with Full-On Footy Pass subscription | The Courier-Mail

title: NRL, AFL live games with Full-On Footy Pass subscription | The Courier-Mail
text:
NRL, AFL live games with Full-On Footy Pass subscription The Courier-Mail February 21, 2017 10:04am 
WE love sport in Queensland and now there’s a new way to enjoy the best out of the NRL and AFL season. 
Today, Australia’s best sports subscription package is launched — the Full-On Footy Pass, brought to you by The Courier-Mail and Sunday Mail . 
This pass gives footy fans 12 months of Foxtel Play as part of a new subscription to The Courier-Mail+. 
That’s a year of Foxtel Play live streaming service to watch every NRL and AFL round live for customers signing up to a 12 month contract news subscription to The Courier-Mail at just $10* per week. 
The channels include Fox Sports 1, Fox Sports 2, Fox Sports 3, Fox Sports 4 and Fox Sports 5; Bein Sports 1, Bein Sports 2 and Bein Sports 3; plus ESPN and ESPN 2, Eurosport and Footy Play. 
But it’s not just sport, with Foxtel lifestyle channels Arena, Lifestyle Home, Lifestyle You, E!, Lifestyle Food, Style and TLC also included on top of the Foxtel basics (Sky News, CNN and BBC World News). 
Subscribers will also receive full digital access to couriermail.com.au, including breaking news, the digital print edition and expert analysis before, during and after your favourite team plays. 
Sports fans also have access to SuperCoach Gold, with extra info, analysis, statistics and player projections in Australia’s favourite SuperCoach fantasy NRL and AFL game. 
The subscription package is available on smart TVs, tablet and smartphone via Foxtel Go, game consoles (PlayStation 3 or 4 and Xbox One), your PC or Mac and Telstra TV. 
Subscribe today at couriermail.com.au/footypass — limited time only. 
* conditions apply
